overview: Established in 1962 as a family-controlled service-based electronics integration company, Westfair TV has been trailblazing the audio/video industry for almost half a century. The firm specializes in home theater design and smart home integration. It only uses the most recognized brands in the audio/video industry including SonyÂ®, Lexicon, and Kaleidescapeâ„¢, among others.
